siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: The inaugural episode of Life with a Twist of Lemon! Stan Lemon and Jon Kohlmeier talk about their favorite podcasts and why they thought that they should move their phone conversations into a podcast format. [audio mp3=”http://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/twistoflemonpod.com/wp…

frontmatter.title: Episode 1 - A Podcast Episode About Podcasts?
